content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a civil case between two parties referred to as aa and bb the case involves the termination and partition of joint ownership of property the viru county court made a decision which was appealed by both parties the tartu district court annulled the previous decision and ordered that the obligations arising from the loan agreements be considered as joint property obligations the court also ordered compensation to be awarded to bb the court dismissed aas appeal and partially satisfied bbs appeal the court determined the properties involved and the liabilities arising from the loan agreements aa was granted sole ownership of one property while bb was granted sole ownership of the other property bb was also assigned the liabilities arising from the loan agreements the court dismissed bbs request to consider another obligation and ordered mutual financial compensation between the parties the court also determined the costs of the proceedings aa was ordered to pay bb a certain amount for procedural costs the decision can be appealed to the supreme court within a certain time frame
